title: lock and unlock
extract: Locked / Unlocked. iPhone 4 on O2, Orange and Vodafone. Definition: A 'locked' mobile phone is one that has been restricted by software so that it can only be used with a single network or carrier. Locked mobile phones are usually GSM phones that use a SIM card - hence the use of the term 'SIM lock'.
extract_html: Locked / Unlocked. iPhone 4 on O2, Orange and Vodafone.
